item.title: Amazon has a 100-foot Flexzilla hose for under $70 today
item.description: BeforeAmazon’s Prime Day 2025 saleendstonight, July 11, the 100-foot Flexzilla hose is 37% off, bringing the original $109.99 price down to just $69.

item.title: Prime Day robot vacuum deals on iRobot, Shark: Savings of up to 55%
item.description: Have a house full of kids and pets, making it an everyday struggle to keep your floors clean?Amazon Prime Day dealsare wrapping up tonight,Friday, July 11, so these deals are just what you need for sparkling clean floors. We've spotted some great deals on manybest-selling robot vacuums. These deals can save you up to 55% off on popular brands from iRobot, Shark, Roborok and more.

item.title: Handheld leaf blowers are all over TikTok: Save 40% on one at Amazon
item.description: Okay, I've been seeing compact electric leaf blowers all over my TikTok feed so when I found this Amazon Prime Day deal, I knew I had to share it.
